languages.text: Все Хаоситы в радиусе 5 клеток вокруг игрока получают -5 Ловкости и -5 Will power

languages.text: Chaos enemies in a 5-cell radius around the Rogue Trader suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.

languages.text: 渾沌敵がローグトレーダーの周囲5セル以内に入った時、この敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}に-5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Chaos enemies in a 5-cell radius around the Rogue Trader suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.

languages.text: Les ennemis du Chaos dans un rayon de 5 cases autour {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5 à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}.

languages.text: Los enemigos del Caos en un radio de 5 casillas en torno al Comerciante Independiente sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.

languages.text: 行商浪人周围5格内，所有混沌阵营的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}降低5点。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in etrafındaki 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan kaos düşmanları, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerine −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar.
